fav.description: display a list of bookmarks - when pressing enter open the one with the typed name if it exists

d.description: search for $query on duckguckgo.com in a new tab

g.description: search for $query on google.com in a new tab

yt.description: search for $query on youtube.com in a new tab

w.description: view $article on wikipedia within this page

notes.description: show a note-taking widget, and optionally perform a function (add, delete or edit) on note with the inputed name

gif.description: display a gif of $gif_content (e.g. a cat) from tenor within this page
